scripts.db: docker-compose exec db psql -U app todo
scripts.run-sql: docker-compose exec -T db psql -U app todo
scripts.start: concurrently "npm -C api start" "npm -C ui start" "npm -C mocks start" "./scripts/create-todos-forever.sh" "sleep 2 && python -m webbrowser -t http://localhost:3002/start"
scripts.install-all: concurrently "npm i" "npm -C api i" "npm -C ui i" "npm -C mocks i"
scripts.everything: npm run check-deps && concurrently "npm run rebuild-infrastructure" "npm run install-all" && npm run start
